Articles.Content:
**So... I don't know how to explain... I found something phenomenal!**

**I played KSP as normally. For some odd reasons I decided to land on darkside of the Mun...**

**Then I found THIS!**

![6qwSv74.png](http://i.imgur.com/6qwSv74.png)

**Here I adjust brightness a bit and yes! It's Daithi de Nogla! Hiding at the Mun! Idk how to use this knowledge...**

![PgZdlpz.png](http://i.imgur.com/PgZdlpz.png)
Who's that? Google didn't reveal much.

No words can describe this but congrats. 

![latest?cb=20081112192239](http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/tesfanon/images/c/c4/Fishystick.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20081112192239)
Uh.. totally photoshopped.+Kerbal doesnt have manley face

Yeah, If you're going to post screenshots..... at least use your Manley face!

Nice pic though.

> 
> Yeah, If you're going to post screenshots..... at least use your Manley face!
> Nice pic though.

I thought about that... Also I thought it'll be too scary for normal users ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Manley Face? As in, that head pack that *scared the crap out of me*?

- - - Updated - - -

Seriously. I let off this short loud "GAH" which made my wife come and see, and have pretty much the same reaction.

It's threads like this that make me feel really old.

Damn kids.

> 
> It's threads like this that make me feel really old.
> Damn kids.

Why? :C

> 
> It's threads like this that make me feel really old.
> Damn kids.

> 
> Why? :C

Lack of reference, presumably? I, too, have absolutely no idea who that is...

> 
> It's threads like this that make me feel really old.
> Damn kids.

Don't worry, you're not the only one. +rep
As this does not actually seem to be about KSP (I think?), it has been moved to the off-topic lounge.

> 
> Lack of reference, presumably? I, too, have absolutely no idea who that is...

Right there with ya guys... gonna assume due to the headset that he's a Youtuber? Never understood the fun in watching someone else play video games :S

> 
> It's threads like this that make me feel really old.

Enough talking.

It's Bingo time, lads, and I don't wanna miss it.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-26T00:43:33Z" title="07/26/2015 12:43  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 26, 2015</time> by Plume & Akakak**

> 
> It's threads like this that make me feel really old.

You really must love the "Favorite Old Game" thread ... I know I do ... ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Hooray, the Vanoss Crew!

I wasn't expecting a crossover with KSP, but hey, that's the internet for ya. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Enough talking.
> It's Bingo time, lads, and I don't wanna miss it.

i best get ready, don't what to be late. 

![The-World%E2%80%99s-Top-10-Best-Bingo-Memes-5.jpg?resize=488%2C264](http://i2.wp.com/theverybesttop10.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/The-World%E2%80%99s-Top-10-Best-Bingo-Memes-5.jpg?resize=488%2C264)
